names.english: boost qi and invigorate the blood decoction
names.commonEnglish: Boost Qi and Invigorate the Blood Decoction

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, regulates the menses, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
With Wu Yao, for Cold dysmenorrhea or postpartum abdominal pain.
With Ru Xiang, Mo Yao, San Leng and E Zhu, for palpable abdominal masses.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and relieves pain.
With Xiang Fu, for flank pain, abdominal pain and dysmenorrhea due to Qi and Blood Stagnation.
Stops bleeding by astringing, invigorates the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi and alleviates pain.
With Mo Yao, for abdominal pain during menstruation.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, alleviates pain, reduces swelling, generates flesh and promotes healing.
Promotes the movement of Qi and alleviates pain.
With Dang Gui and Xiang Fu, for menstrual pain.
Spreads and regulates Liver Qi, regulates menstruation and alleviates pain.
With Dang Gui, tonifies the Blood and moves Qi, for premenstrual symptoms, menstrual pain and irregular menstruation.
With Wu Yao, for Qi and Blood Stagnation with menstrual irregularity, pain in the lower abdomen and generalized pain and distention throughout the body.
Forcefully breaks up Blood Stasis, regulates Qi, alleviates pain, dissolves accumulations and regulates menstruation.

With E Zhu, for Qi and Blood Stagnation with clumping and accumulation leading to pain with distending pain in the chest, epigastrium and abdomen, amenorrhea, dysmenorrhea, uterine myoma and ovarian cysts.
Invigorates Blood circulation, dispels Blood Stasis, regulates Qi, dissolves accumulations and alleviates pain.
Tonifies the Middle Jiao,augments Qi and nourishes the Blood.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, cools the Blood and reduces abscesses.
With Dang Gui, for irregular menstruation and retained lochia from Blood Stasis.
With Ru Xiang, for Blood Stasis causing swelling and pain.
Drains Heat and generates Fluids.
Tonifies Qi
Nourishes the Blood
Invigorates the Blood
Transforms Stasis
Moves Qi
Stops pain
syndromes: Qi and Blood Stagnation with Qi and Blood Deficiency

symptoms: Pain that is fixed, stabbing and /or severe or
Blue, dark or purplish discoloration of skin in small or large areas,
Tendency to hemorrhage dark blood or clots
manifestations.tongue: Purple, possible red spots or Pale
manifestations.pulse: Thready and rapid or Weak or Choppy or Wiry and choppy
